mapper.select: SELECT * FROM KS_MENU ORDER BY PID, MENU_ID, ORDERING
SELECT MENU_ID , LEVEL , NAME , URL FROM KS_MENU WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM KOMSIA.KS_MENU WHERE PID = #{pid} OR MENU_ID = #{pid}
SELECT NAME FROM KOMSIA.KS_MENU WHERE MENU_ID = ( SELECT PID FROM KOMSIA.KS_MENU WHERE URL = #{url} AND USE_YN = 'Y' )

WITH RECURSIVE CTE (MENU_ID, LEVEL, NAME, PID, URL, ORDERING, USE_YN) AS ( SELECT MENU_ID , LEVEL , NAME , PID , URL , ORDERING , USE_YN FROM KOMSIA.KS_MENU WHERE PID = ( SELECT PID FROM KOMSIA.KS_MENU WHERE URL = #{url} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) UNION ALL SELECT M.MENU_ID , M.LEVEL , M.NAME , M.PID , M.URL , M.ORDERING , M.USE_YN FROM KOMSIA.KS_MENU M INNER JOIN CTE ON M.PID = CTE.MENU_ID ) SELECT * FROM CTE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
